attributes.action: Decrease the minimum wage to 18 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At 18 years old we are adults. we can drink, smoke, put a deposit on a house, have overdrafts and loans. Cars to buy, Insure and tax, Petrol to buy, rent and phone bills to pay.

Why at 18 years old can we not have the same minimum wage as people that are 22? 

How are the people in the bracket of 18 - 21 who are in full time employment suppose to save with so little money?

Its fair for students that don't have to pay tax.

Please decrease the age to 18 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
